import pandas as pd
import numpy as np
import seaborn as sns

                Base = New[item].get_group(time)

                Middle = Base[Base['age'] == "19-29"]
                
                Middle1 = Base[Base['age'] == "30-39"]
                
                
                Old = Base[Base['age'] == ">40"]
                    

                x = np.mean(Young.score)
                print(x)
                y = np.mean(Middle.score)
                z = np.mean(Middle1.score)
                a = np.mean(Old.score)
                #print(x,y)
                df1.loc[item,time] = x
                
                df2.loc[item,time] = y
                
                df3.loc[item,time] = z
                
                df.loc[item,time] =a 
                
              
               
        except Exception as e:
           
            pass
            



     


Filled = df.fillna(0)

sns.heatmap(Filled)

new_Frame1 = pd.DataFrame(columns=listy,index=flat_list)




for item in flat_list:
    
    for time in listy:
        
        try:
            
                Male = New[item].get_group(time) 
                Male1 =Male[Male['gender'] == "Male"]

                Female = New[item].get_group(time) 
                Female1 = Female[Female['gender'] == "Female"]

                x = np.mean(Female1.score)
                y = np.mean(Male1.score)
                #print(x,y)
                new_Frame1.loc[item,time] = x
                
                new_frame2.loc[item,time] = y
               
        except Exception as e:
           
            pass

new_Frame1

plt.matshow()

analyser = SentimentIntensityAnalyzer()
def _processTweet(tweets):
    label = []
    for tweet in tweets:
        spell = SpellChecker()
        tweet = re.sub('((www\.[^\s]+)|(https?://[^\s]+))', 'URL', tweet)  # remove URLs
        tweet = re.sub('@[^\s]+', 'AT_USER', tweet)  # remove usernames
        tweet = re.sub(r'#([^\s]+)', r'\1', tweet)  # remove the # in #hashtag
        pattern = re.compile(r"(.)\1{2,}")
        tweet = pattern.sub(r"\1\1", tweet)
        tweet = word_tokenize(tweet)

        misspelled = spell.unknown(tweet)

        for word in misspelled:
            tweet = [spell.correction((word)) if x == word else x for x in tweet]
        String= ''
        for item in tweet:
            String = String+item+" "
        vs = analyser.polarity_scores(String)['compound']

        if (float(vs) >= .05):
            score = (vs)
            sentiment = 4

        elif (float(vs) <= -.05):
            score = (vs)
            sentiment = 0

        else:
            score = (vs)
            sentiment = 2
        print(String)
        label.append(sentiment)




       
    return label
